body_html:
@ezyang - I suppose there is little value in hosting old nightly binaries (beyond 1-2 weeks). Maybe you could have additional binaries hosted for major feature additions. If occasionally one needs to build an older version, they could build it from source.

One minor issue to resolve is where to put all the nightly binaries

I suppose we could use Amazon S3 to host it? That's what I was planning to do.
